About Sponsor FAQ 2018

Create, build, and play @ McHacks

McGill University - February 2-3, 2019

Behind Canada's original collegiate hackathon

Coming back for round 6, McHacks is a 24-hour annual hackathon held at McGill University in Montreal, Canada. Each year, we welcome over 500 students from schools across North America for a fun-filled weekend of workshops, hardware, food, and of course, hacking! We hope that youâ€™ll join us on February 2-3, 2019 for an opportunity to dream, develop, and deploy innovative new technologies - all in just 24 hours!
